snippet.title: Robbers' daylight jewellery store raid
snippet.content: ROBBERS have targeted a jewellery store in Melbourne's north in a smash and grab raid. Grounds Jewellers in Settlement Rd, Thomastown, was hit around midday. The Herald Sun understands up to seven offenders were involved and travelled to the store in two vehicles. A woman who works at the store confirmed there was a robbery. "They didn't get away with much," she said. "There is a lot of security here and fortunately that slowed them down." More to come.
